items.title: Auto parts maker Suprajit Engineering sees 'minimal impact' of 25 percent Trump tariffs, exploring 'full relief' from buyers
items.description: Suprajit Engineering said most parts of the company's business are not affected at all by the tariffs, however a small portion of exports could endure a possible tariff hit of about $0.5 million, and the company is talking to customers to seek a full relief.

items.title: NCC Limited: Weak Q1 results; execution to pick-up strongly
items.description: Despite a weak Q1, NCC has retained the guidance for FY26 growth and order inflow

items.title: IBC 2025: Ambitious reforms undermined by institutional weakness
items.description: The IBC Amendment Bill 2025 proposes major reforms to expedite insolvency resolution and empower creditors, but its success hinges on strengthening the NCLT’s capacity and addressing persistent institutional shortcomings

items.title: What can drive the stock performance of this financial services player?
items.description: Poised to maintain growth momentum with a sustainable business model

items.title: boAt to co-develop India-made chips with HrdWyr; Tata Electronics to assemble
items.description: boAt plans to integrate it into 25 percent of its devices by 2026, starting with the premium Nirvana range

items.title: State-run BEML has plans to make Tunnel Boring Machines to cut dependence on China
items.description: State-run BEML has recently invited Expression of Interest for design consultancy to develop indigenous Tunnel Boring Machines.
